title: Smog - hydrocarbon and ozone concentration linked

content.description: The following questions(s) refer to the diagram below, which depicts the concentrations of various gases in the air over a city on a typical smoggy day.
content.question: If technology that reduces the hydrocarbon concentration had been utilized, which of the following would have been the most likely result?

choices.label: The concentration of NO would have been higher.
The concentration of CO2 would have been lower.
The concentration of O3 would have been higher.
The concentration of O3 would have been lower.
The concentration of aldehydes would have been higher.

content.answer: The concentration of O3 would have been lower.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
